item.title: Leetcode 1784
item.description: 1784. Check if Binary String Has at Most One Segment of Ones The problem description is: Given a binary string s without leading zeros, return true if s contains at most one contiguous segment of ones. Otherwise, return false. This is kind of hard to understand, so I am going to explain it. A contiguous segment of ones looks like: 111000 100 10 1 11110000 And some of the ones that are not contiguous are:
